Sister Charity (Ezi aha Kobutungi Charity) bụ onye na-ese egwu na onye TV n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda
Ọ na-egosi ihe ngosi ụtụtụ (Sisimuka) na TV ọdịda anyanwụ na Mbarara, Uganda

A maara ya nke ọma maka ịgụ egwu ya nke afọ 2001 bụ Grade. Ọ na-abụkarị abụ n'asụsụ ala ya bụ Runyankole na Luganda na Bekee. E depụtara ya n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe kachasị mma si ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda  n'akụkụ ụzọ Julina Kanyomozi, Ray G,Angella Katatumba na Toniks na Hi Pipo
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na otu akpọrọ TYE (Train the youth effort) band na afọ 2000. Charity sonyeere Rays Band nke Rasta Charz nwere, nke ya na ya na-eme
O nyekwara aka na ọrụ Am A Uganda site n'iweta ozi ya n'abụ akpọrọ 'Ndi Omunya Uganda' abụ nke ya na Santana onye na-akwado ya na ihe nkiri odida anyanwu na onye egwu.
Sister Charity nwere abọm itoolu na ndị a gụnyere Grade, Omufumbo, Pound, Choice, Nkyalimbooko, Jambuura na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ndị a dị n'asụsụ obodo ya (Runyankole) ma e wezụga ụfọdụ ole na ole nke dị na asụsụ Luganda na Bekee.
N'afọ Sister Charity was announced as a presenter for the morning show (Sisimuka) on Vision Group's TV West in Mbarara where she works until now.
A mụrụ ya na abalị asaa na onwa Juun nke afọ1980 nye Maazị na Oriakụ
Enoth Buriita n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ isii ma ọ bụ onye nke abụọ a mụrụ

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rweibaare Primary school, Rweibaare Secondary school, gukwa na Train The youth Effort (TYE) maka ọkwa dị elu ma mesịa sonye na Mbarara Business School (MBI) ebe ọ nwetara UNEB Dip na Accountancy Ọ lụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ya bụ Rasta Charz mana ọ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2013 na-ekwu maka enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na mmekọrịta ha.
